name: Maps4J
short_description: The origin of this project was the learning and the application of macro-operators to the Rubik Cube problem by means of Multi-Agent Systems. Specifically, it is based on the study and implementation of the learning strategies presented by Korf in early papers, from an perspective based on Multi-Agent Systems. As a result we have developped Maps4J, a solution where cooperation and coordination among agents, during learning and resolution process, play the main role. Moreover, this project tries to illustrate the virtues of Multi-Agent Systems, related to the learning and the resolution tasks, from a approach based on coordination.
